description: Main application source file for the Flutter-based finance tracker app. Contains widget definitions, navigation, and integration points for core features such as authentication, transactions, budgets, and analytics.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring dark theme and setting up the home route.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Handles user authentication state and navigates between login, register, and main dashboard views.

classes.name: _AuthNavigationState
classes.description: State management for AuthNavigation, tracking authentication status and UI switches.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation for primary sections: Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, Charts.

classes.name: _MainScaffoldState
classes.description: State management for bottom navigation index and screen display.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Login form UI with email/password input, login handling, and navigation to registration.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State management of login process, including loading state and error handling.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Registration form UI with email/password input, validation, and registration process.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State management for registration, including validation, success/error feedback.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and links to add new ones; provides overview and navigation.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: Manages fetching recent transactions and UI interactions in dashboard.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Lists, adds, edits, and deletes transactions with refresh capabilities.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: Manages transaction list state, fetching, deleting, and navigation to edit.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing a transaction, with date picker and validation.

classes.name: _TransactionEditScreenState
classes.description: Manages form state, validation, and save/update logic.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays budgets per category and refreshes data.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: Manages fetching and rendering budget data.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Displays analytics and spending breakdown charts.

classes.name: _ChartsScreenState
classes.description: Handles fetching analytics data and rendering charts with refresh.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for the Flutter app, runs the root widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Override in widgets to define UI layout.

methods.name: _onAuthenticated
methods.description: Callback when user authentication is successful.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user and updates UI.

methods.name: _deleteTx
methods.description: Deletes a specific transaction after confirmation.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Displays date picker dialog and sets selected date.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving or updating transaction based on form data.
